Marvin - I've had a good look and it looks very interesting. The one
thing =
I'm leary of is the separate XML file to mark the cases to
ignore. Have you=
 considered using Javadoc tags that you could pick up
via reflection? This =
has the distinct advantage that the tags to
ignore a method pair are tied t=
o the methods.

Otherwise it looks very interesting.

Cheers
